name: Crackling Champagne
description: Upon use, increases all allies' Burn RES by 100% for 4 turns for the next battle. When this bonus expires, all allies lose 30 Energy.
story:
This sparkling drink that tastes both sour and bitter serves as an exceptionally revitalizing remedy for summer heat, and consuming it often results in sneezing and a runny nose. According to those who have tasted it, it feels like a cold hand pressed against the back of your neck.

"Pikka... Ah-choo...!"
